name:
UPS
 Healthcare
 Onboarding
 Portal
description: I participated in a UPS Hackathon to solve a customer experience problem with UPS Healthcare. I built a website where clients and administrators could see projects associated with each other using Google Cloud Platform the host the project's data.

name:
Bar
 Path
 Tracking
description: I built an object tracking program in Python using a trained deep learning model to track the bar path of my lifts. I used OpenCV during post-processing to draw the lines on the video to indicate the bar path and applied weights to data points to increase the accuracy of the bounding box.

name: PeterPortal
description: I worked with other developers in ICS Student Council to build a web application to provide course information for UCI students. I independently did work on a new road map feature utilized for 4-year planning and making the website more mobile-friendly. We used RESTful API to get information from databases another branch of ICS Student Council.

name:
Find
 Your
 Anchor
description: I worked with other developers and designers in Commit the Change to build a web application for Find Your Anchor, a non-profit suicide prevention organization. They send out gratitude boxes to those in need to give them an extra boost in life. I worked on creating a React website to display 30,000+ gratitude boxes on a map for administrators to easily track and approve. Additionally, we used PostgreSQL to hold all the data of the gratitude boxes.
